alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Moore; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 30 at 9:48PM EDT until September 30 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR CHATHAM, HARNETT, CENTRAL JOHNSTON, LEE, MOORE AND WAKE COUNTIES... At 948 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Sanford, Southern Pines, Smithfield, Pittsboro, Lillington, Carthage, Siler City, Wake Forest, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Clayton, Pinehurst, Dunn, Zebulon, Angier, Benson and Goldston. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Chatham; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Moore; Wake
